item.title: 2017 MacBook Pro 512gb Touchbar
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jimmy89)
item.dc:creator: Jimmy89
item.content:encoded:
Up for sale is my girlfriends late 2017 MacBook Pro 13inch 512gb Touchbar, purchased September 2017.

Reason for sale is she has started to get into gaming and wants to make a move to a windows based computer.

MacBook has only been actively used for a few months, so is cosmetically in great condition.

The speakers do crackle at high volume due to a minor liquid spill, however touchbar, keyboard and trackpad etc are working perfectly....

2017 MacBook Pro 512gb Touchbar

item.title: Dell Optiplex USFF (ultra small form factor)
item.author: invalid@example.com (havabeer)
item.dc:creator: havabeer
item.content:encoded:
Hi Everyone

have for sale a dell optiplex 780 USFF. was using this as a media player in my lounge room till i upgraded to a smart TV

E8400/3.0GHzE CPU (will need to double check)
4 gig of ram
160gig sata HDD
dvd drive

will come formatted so you will need to install you're own copy of windows. great little machines, especially for playing movies or just general office work. 24cm x 24cm x 6.5cm

$35

will post at buyers expense or pick up from 2264 nsw

Purchased from mwave August 2016, have invoice

Inst 900

Close 24hrs after reserve met...

item.title: FS: AM4 Loop - Raystorm Pro, EX240 multiport rad, EK X-Res 100 SPC-60 PWM, fittings, fans, etc.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ratzz)
item.dc:creator: Ratzz
item.content:encoded:
SOLD @ $150 pickup. Goneski, thanks to all for looking, and sorry to those who missed the bus !!


FS: AM4 loop. Pickup>post. Pickup 3192 all hours.

Feel free to make offers, I have no particular reserve in mind. I'll just take any offers on individual parts, if I feel comfortable with the offer. I'll probably revise my own expectations in line with what people are offering, hence the lack of a reserve price....

FS: AM4 Loop - Raystorm Pro, EX240 multiport rad, EK X-Res 100 SPC-60 PWM, fittings, fans, etc.

item.title: Box of Gaming Mice, Ergo Mice Pack
item.author: invalid@example.com (Camm)
item.dc:creator: Camm
item.content:encoded:
11 Various Gaming Mice - Sold to Moarphine

Having hand issues, it took me a while to find a mouse (well mice) that fits my hand and lets me play. These are all the gaming mice I have left over at the moment. Most were used long enough to figure out my hand hated it, ones that were used more have been noted, but generally all are in great condition.

No accessories other than the mouse itself is guarunteed, but what I can find laying around will be thrown in.

Logitech G302...

Box of Gaming Mice, Ergo Mice Pack

item.title: 2x HP NL36 MicroServer with 8 GB Ram + 6x 2TB drives
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheOneWhoIsMany)
item.dc:creator: TheOneWhoIsMany
item.content:encoded:
Hey Guys,

I've got some old stuff I'm clearing out including.
  • 2x HP NL36 MicroServer with 8GB ram.
    • Both boxes run fine.
    • Both have 2x 4 GB ram modules (not ECC).
    • They both have the BIOS loaded that lets you use all six "sata" ports.
    • One has a 2 port NIC (I think its a Broadcom).
    • Ones got a eSATA pass through cable.
    • One has an HP SAS controller of some sort can't remember what it is.
    • One server has an install of unRAID (on the USB key) - I no longer use...

2x HP NL36 MicroServer with 8 GB Ram + 6x 2TB drives
